trans-unit.source: Acts as a container to a group of activities that is executed when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> starts running.
trans-unit.target: 作为将在 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> 开始运行时执行的一组活动的容器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> acts as a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> to all activities it contains.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 作为其中包含的所有活动的 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> classes may be included in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>.

If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> exists in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is the first activity that gets executed when the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> starts executing.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 中存在 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>，则 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 是在 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 开始执行时执行的第一个活动。

trans-unit.source: In some ways the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is like an `OnEnterState` handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 在某些方面与 `OnEnterState` 处理程序相似。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is not a mandatory activity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 不是 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 中的强制活动。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 是一种 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>，这意味着 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 可以包含其他活动。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> cannot contain any activity that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> interface, which includes all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activities and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 不能包含实现 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> 接口的任何活动，该接口包括所有的 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> 活动和 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 活动。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is executed in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, a non-blocking manner that makes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> ready to receive events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 以非阻止方式在 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 中执行，使 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 可以随时接收事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> activity, so that it can model a state machine where transitions occur from state to state without receiving any event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 可以包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> 活动，因此它可以模拟状态机，状态转换时不会接收任何事件。

trans-unit.source: In that sense the state machine behaves like a sequential workflow.
trans-unit.target: 从这种意义上来说，状态机的行为类似于顺序工作流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the State Initialization SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自“状态初始化”SDK 示例。
有关详细信息，请参阅[状态初始化示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9053202f-2567-4428-a4a2-85423963646b)。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用活动名初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> 类的新实例。
